name: EQuateJS
tagline: A web API platform using (E)vents and (Q)ueries to manage application state
body:
### Installation

```
npm install --save eq8
```

## Quick Start

- Follow the [Guides](./docs/guides/README.md) with the [Examples](https://github.com/eq8/eq8-examples):

```
git clone https://github.com/eq8/eq8-examples.git
```

- Read the [Introduction](./docs/README.md)
- Learn the [Concepts](./docs/concepts/README.md)
- Familiarize yourself with the [API](./docs/api/README.md)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
